story.kicker_image_caption: MGM Institute of Health Sciences admissions 2016
story.storykicker: The Mahatma Gandhi Mission Institute of Health Sciences (MGMIHS), Navi Mumbai has released an admission notification, inviting candidates to apply for its Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) and Master of Science (M.Sc) programmes. The last date for the application submission is June 30.
story.storybody:
The Mahatma Gandhi Mission Institute of Health Sciences (MGMIHS), Navi Mumbai has released an admission notification, inviting applications from interested and eligible candidates to apply for its Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) in Paramedical and Master of Science (M.Sc) in Medical programmes for the commencing academic session 2016.

B.Sc Paramedical programs include:

  • Operation Theatre & Anesthesia Technology
  • Cardiac Technology
  • Perfusion Technology
  • Medical Laboratory Technology
  • Medical Imaging Technology
  • Dialysis Technology
  • Optometry

M.Sc Medical programs include:

  • Anatomy
  • Physiology
  • Biochemistry
  • Pharmacology
  • Microbiology
  • Genetics
  • Biotechnology
  • Clinical Research

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

B.Sc programmes: Those interested in applying should have passed Class 12 Science with 45 percent in physics, chemistry & biology or equivalent degree from any recognised university.

M.Sc programmes: Those interested in applying should have scored 50 percent marks in B.Sc botany/zoology/chemistry/microbiology/biotechnology/biochemistry/B.Sc Nursing/MBBS/ BDS/ BAMS/ BHMS) or any equivalent degree from any recognised university.

Selection procedure

B.Sc: Candidates will be selected as per his/her merit in Class 12 Science or equivalent.

M.Sc Programs: Candidates will be selected as per his/her merit in any recognised graduation programme.

How to apply

B.Sc : The application forms can be obtained in person on payment of Rs 500 from MGM Institute of Health Sciences, Navi Mumbai.

M.Sc: The application forms can be obtained in person or on payment of Rs 1000 from MGM Institute of Health Sciences, Navi Mumbai.

Important dates

The last date for the submission of application form is June 30.

Read: University of Calcutta Admissions 2016: Apply before June 17

For information on more courses and admissions, click here
